battle_traits.name: The Great Plan
battle_traits.description: The Seraphon look to the heavens for guidance, scrying the stars above in the hope that the Great Plan is revealed to them.
battle_traits.effect: That Asterism ability can be used for the rest of the battle, but the others cannot, unless allowed by the 'Further the Great Plan' ability.

battle_traits.name: Further The Great Plan
battle_traits.description: As the battle unfolds, so do the machinations of the Old Ones.
battle_traits.declare: You can use this ability if you meet the condition below that corresponds to the Asterism you picked in the deployment phase. Itzl the Tamer: 3 or more enemy units have been destroyed. Quetzl the Preserver: There are no enemy units wholly within friendly territory. Sotek the Deliverer: The enemy general is in combat or has been destroyed. Tepok the Seer: There are any friendly Slann units on the battlefield and no friendly Slann units are in combat or have been destroyed.
battle_traits.effect: Pick a different Asterism ability. It can be used in addition to the one you picked in the deployment phase.

battle_traits.name: Itzl The Tamer
battle_traits.description: Itzl is the most bestial of all the Old Ones and his asterism fills the Seraphon with ferocity.
battle_traits.effect: Companion weapons used by friendly Seraphon units have Crit (2 Hits).

battle_traits.name: Quetzl The Preserver
battle_traits.description: Quetzl grants protection from the dangers of the physical realms.
battle_traits.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of melee weapons for attacks that target friendly Seraphon units that are wholly within friendly territory.

battle_traits.name: Sotek The Deliverer
battle_traits.description: The Asterism of Sotek emboldens the Seraphon with a war-hungry aggression.
battle_traits.effect: Add 2 to the Move characteristic of friendly Seraphon units.

battle_traits.name: Tepok The Seer
battle_traits.description: The sign of Tepok, resplendent in the stars above, enlivens the land with thrumming geomantic energy.
battle_traits.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly Seraphon units.

Eternal Starhost.name: Celestial Translocation
Eternal Starhost.description: In a flash of starlight, an Eternal Starhost arrives to enact the will of the Old Ones. Tapping into the celestial power that surrounds the slann, they teleport across the battlefield to catch the foe off guard.
Eternal Starhost.declare: Pick a friendly Seraphon unit wholly within 12" of a friendly Seraphon Wizard to use this ability.
Eternal Starhost.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

Sunclaw Starhost.name: Vengeance Of Azyr
Sunclaw Starhost.description: The celestite weapons carried by the warriors of a Sunclaw Starhost are supercharged with the power of Azyr.
Sunclaw Starhost.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly Saurus or Kroxigor units that are in combat to be the targets.
Sunclaw Starhost.effect: For each target: * Make a pile-in move. * Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

Shadowstrike Starhost.name: Nimble And Quick
Shadowstrike Starhost.description: The skink warriors of a Shadowstrike Starhost outmanoeuvre their enemies at every turn.
Shadowstrike Starhost.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly Skink Infantry or Skink Cavalry units that are not in combat to be the targets.
Shadowstrike Starhost.effect: Each target can move D6". Each target cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

Thunderquake Starhost.name: Scaly Monstrosities
Thunderquake Starhost.description: The great beasts of the Seraphon are almost invincible when they march forth as a pack.
Thunderquake Starhost.effect: Add 2 to the Health characteristic of friendly Seraphon Monster units.

heroic_traits.name: Being Of The Stars
heroic_traits.description: This hero has a particularly strong connection to their astral heritage, causing their corporeality to wax and wane.
heroic_traits.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

heroic_traits.name: Reptilian Cunning
heroic_traits.description: With cold- blooded calculation, this general looks for opportunities to strike.
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit charged this turn, if a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the 'All-out Attack' command in the combat phase, no command points are spent.

heroic_traits.name: Beastmaster
heroic_traits.description: This mighty leader has a primal dominance over the beasts of the Seraphon hosts, driving them forward to battle.
heroic_traits.effect: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly Seraphon Cavalry and Seraphon Monster units for the rest of the phase if they are wholly within 12" of this unit at the start of the move.

artefacts_of_power.reaction_condition: You declared a  Spell ability for a friendly Seraphon Wizard within this unit's combat range
artefacts_of_power.name: Coatl Familiar
artefacts_of_power.description: Though only a juvenile example of the great feathered serpents, this winged creature is still sacred to the mage-god Tepok.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Add D6 to the casting roll for that spell.

artefacts_of_power.name: Incandescent Rectrices
artefacts_of_power.description: This vibrant plumage imbues the bearer with the restorative power of the heavens.

artefacts_of_power.name: Bloodrage Pendant
artefacts_of_power.description: Carved from the bones of savage reptilian megafauna, the Bloodrage Pendant spurs a warrior's killing rage - all the more should they themselves shed gore.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons. Add 2 instead if the number of damage points allocated to this unit is equal to or greater than half of this unit's Health characteristic (rounding up).

Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.name: Mystical Unforging
Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.description: The magic of unmaking flies from the wizard's outstretched hands.
Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.declare: Pick a friendly Seraphon Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the target's weapons until the start of your next turn.

Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.name: Comet'S Call
Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.description: Their consciousness soaring up to the heavens, the wizard summons a celestial comet that plummets down into the enemy ranks.
Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.declare: Pick a friendly Seraphon Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.name: Speed Of Huanchi
Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.description: With the grace and momentum of a prowling beast, the allies of the priestly mage are filled with a celestial haste.
Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.declare: Pick a friendly Seraphon Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Seraphon unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Celestial Manipulation.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target can use a Run ability and still use Shoot and/or Charge abilities later in the turn.

Lore Of Primal Jungles.name: Light Of Chotec
Lore Of Primal Jungles.description: The wizard calls upon the sun god Chotec to energise an injured warrior with rays of invigorating solar magics.
Lore Of Primal Jungles.declare: Pick a friendly Seraphon Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Seraphon unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Primal Jungles.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of damage points the target has. For each 4+, Heal (1) the target.

Lore Of Primal Jungles.name: The Earth Trembles
Lore Of Primal Jungles.description: With a focused pulse of will, the Starmaster sets the energy of the ley lines spiking until the ground is violently torn asunder.
Lore Of Primal Jungles.declare: Pick a friendly Seraphon Wizard to cast this spell, pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of them to be the target point, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Primal Jungles.effect: Draw a straight line between the target point and the closest part on the caster's base. Roll a D3 for each unit (friendly and enemy) that has models passed across by this line. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

Lore Of Primal Jungles.name: Empowered Celestite
Lore Of Primal Jungles.description: Tapping into the ancient technologies within the weapons of the Coalesced, a light is birthed in each; for a few moments, every strike shatters armour in an explosion of sparks.
Lore Of Primal Jungles.declare: Pick a friendly Seraphon Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Saurus unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore Of Primal Jungles.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target's melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Supreme Master Of Order
abilities.description: The slann are amongst the greatest wizards in existence, but Lord Kroak is mighty even in comparison to others of his kind.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to casting rolls for this unit. In addition, this unit can use an Unbind ability if an enemy Wizard anywhere on the battlefield uses a Spell ability instead of an enemy Wizard within 30" of this unit, and when using the 'Banish Manifestation' ability, this unit can pick a manifestation anywhere on the battlefield instead of within 30" of it.

abilities.name: Dead For Innumerable Ages
abilities.description: Lord Kroak is no longer truly alive; his form is preserved only by his indomitable spirit. As a result, he is immune to all but the most devastating attacks.
abilities.effect: This unit must use this ability each turn while it is damaged. Roll 3D6 and add the number of damage points this unit has to the roll. On a 20+, this unit is destroyed. Otherwise, Heal (18) this unit.

abilities.name: Arcane Vassal
abilities.description: A Slann Starmaster can channel the power of a spell through one of their followers.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Skink Wizard wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Measure the range and visibility of the next Spell ability used by this unit from the target instead of from this unit. 7

abilities.name: Celestial Deliverance
abilities.description: Lord Kroak's palanquin quivers with barely contained force before unleashing ruination on the enemies of the Seraphon.
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell more than once per phase. Pick up to 3 different visible enemy units within 12" of this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Masters Of Order
abilities.description: The slann are amongst the greatest wizards in existence, and they shape the very stars with their magic.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit. In addition, this unit can use an Unbind ability if an enemy Wizard anywhere on the battlefield uses a Spell ability instead of an enemy Wizard within 30" of this unit, and when using the 'Banish Manifestation' ability, this unit can pick a manifestation anywhere on the battlefield instead of within 30" of it. 6

abilities.name: Celestial Equilibrium
abilities.description: The slann's form seems to shimmer and fade as it draws links between their allies and the turnings of the stars.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to casting rolls made for other friendly Seraphon Wizards while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Arcane Vassal
abilities.description: A Slann Starmaster can channel the power of a spell through one of their followers.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Skink Wizard wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Measure the range and visibility of the next Spell ability used by this unit from the target instead of from this unit.

abilities.name: Celestial Reinforcements
abilities.description: The slann summons Seraphon warriors to the battlefield to bolster their forces and ensure the Great Plan is made manifest.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Seraphon unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Troglodon's Jaws is 2.

abilities.name: Noxious Roar
abilities.description: These creatures bring the roul stench of their swampland homes to battle, their noxious breath reeking all the worse when they roar in anger.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Terror
abilities.description: This terrifying monstrosity strikes fear into the hearts of its foes.
abilities.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Troglodon Regeneration
abilities.description: Troglodons are able to mend injured flesh almost as soon as they are harmed.
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Carnosaur's Massive Jaws is 2.

abilities.name: Spearhead Of The Charge
abilities.description: Atop their mighty Carnosaur steeds, Oldbloods lead their saurian brethren into battle.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly Saurus units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Terror
abilities.description: This terrifying monstrosity strikes fear into the hearts of its foes.
abilities.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
abilities.description: A Carnosaur that senses an injured predator will not hesitate to assert its dominance in combat.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat with any damaged enemy Monsters, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

melee.name: Aggradon's Rending Bites and Striking Talons

abilities.name: Primal Rage
abilities.description: The mere taste of enemy blood whips an Aggradon into a battle frenzy and sends the beast on a violent rampage.
abilities.effect: This unit must use this ability each turn. If this unit used any Fight abilities this turn, place a rage token next to it, to a maximum of 3. If this unit did not use any Fight abilities this turn, remove all rage tokens it has. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's Companion weapons for each rage token it has until the end of the next turn.

abilities.name: Alpha Roar
abilities.description: The Aggradons ridden by Scar-Veterans are the most violent examples of a brutal species. When they throw back their heads to unleash a ear- splitting roar, their kin soon follow suit.
abilities.effect: Place a rage token next to this unit and each friendly Aggradon Lancers unit wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3 per unit.

melee.name: Aggradon's Rending Bites and Striking Talons

abilities.name: Primal Rage
abilities.description: The mere taste of enemy blood whips an Aggradon into a battle frenzy and sends the beast on a violent rampage.
abilities.effect: This unit must use this ability each turn. If this unit used any Fight abilities this turn, place a rage token next to it, to a maximum of 3. If this unit did not use any Fight abilities this turn, remove all rage tokens it has. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's Companion weapons for each rage token it has until the end of the next turn.

abilities.name: Ordered Cohorts
abilities.description: Devoted servants of the Old Ones, Saurus Warriors are as intractable in defence as they are relentless upon the attack.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for this unit while each model in this unit is contesting an objective you control.

abilities.name: Selfless Protectors
abilities.description: The Saurus Guard stand as a living shield between the leaders of the Seraphon and their foes.
abilities.effect: While any friendly Slann units are within this unit's combat range, both this unit and those Slann units have Ward (5+).

abilities.name: Scry The Stars
abilities.description: By drawing upon the energies of the heavens, the Starseer peers along the tangled weave of fate, gleaning insight that can be used to prepare their servants.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the current battle round number. For each 3+, pick a friendly Seraphon unit wholly within 18" of this unit. That unit has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn. 7

abilities.name: Celestial Doom
abilities.description: The Starseer harnesses their deep connection with Azyr to subtly shift the alignment of the stars above, altering the path of fate and spelling doom for those who stand in the way of the Great Plan.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Serpent Staff
abilities.description: Channelling cosmic power through their twin-headed staff, a Starpriest causes their allies' weapons to drip with deadly venom.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Seraphon unit wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target's melee weapons have Crit (Auto-wound) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Swift And Nimble
abilities.description: Though not physically powerful, skinks are fleet of foot, able to rapidly redeploy and outmanoeuvre the enemy at a single chirruped command.
abilities.effect: When this unit uses the 'Redeploy' command, when determining the distance this unit can move, you can roll 2 dice instead of 1 and pick either result.

abilities.name: Sun Acolytes
abilities.description: The Sun Acolytes that accompany a Spawn of Chotec carry out complex tasks upon the battlefield safe in the knowledge that the salamander serves as a deadly deterrent to would- be attackers.
abilities.effect: This unit has a crew of 3 Sun Acolytes that are tokens. Add 1 to this unit's control score for each Sun Acolyte it has. If this unit has no Sun Acolytes, it has a maximum control score of 1 for the rest of the battle. Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove 1 of its Sun Acolytes from the battlefield after the Attack ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

abilities.name: Acid-Fuelled Flame
abilities.description: The fiery secretions belched up by the Spawn of Chotec melt armour and flesh long after they have hit their targets.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a Shoot ability, you must pick either its Glob of Flame Acid or its Stream of Fire ranged weapon. In addition, after resolving shooting attacks made with this unit's Glob of Flame Acid, if any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by those attacks, subtract 1 from save rolls for that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Deadly Cohesion
abilities.description: Raptadon Hunters pepper enemy lines with volleys of starstone javelins, exposing weak points for Raptadon Chargers to exploit.
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a friendly Raptadon Chargers unit that charged this turn and is within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit can use a Shoot ability as if it were your shooting phase. It must target a visible enemy unit in combat with the target.

abilities.name: Cold-Blooded Unity
abilities.description: The blasts unleashed by Raptadon Chargers' sacred lances are all the more effective when targeting enemies suppressed by javelins from a Hunter cohort.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit's combat attacks if they target an enemy unit that was targeted by shooting attacks made by a friendly Raptadon Hunters unit in the same turn.

abilities.name: Hidden Hunters
abilities.description: The Hunters of Huanchi can blend in with their surroundings and vanish from sight.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve in ambush. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Star-Venom
abilities.description: The blowdarts used by the Hunters of Huanchi are coated in deadly toxins.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit's Dartpipe to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target's combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Chameleon Ambush
abilities.description: The Hunters of Huanchi emerge from hiding and pepper their enemies with projectiles.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is in ambush.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Hunters of Huanchi with Starstone Bolas

abilities.name: Hidden Hunters
abilities.description: The Hunters of Huanchi can blend in with their surroundings and vanish from sight.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve in ambush. It has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Chameleon Ambush
abilities.description: The Hunters of Huanchi emerge from hiding and pepper their enemies with projectiles.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is in ambush.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Starstone Bolas
abilities.description: A perfectly timed bola throw can ensnare an enemy.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was targeted by this unit's Starstone Bolas this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Nerve-Shredding Screeches
abilities.description: Despite their small stature, the shrill cries of a Terrawing flock can cause disarray across the enemy line as orders are drowned out by the cacophony.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 10" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. If the roll exceeds the target's Control characteristic, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Ark Of Sotek
abilities.description: So numerous are the snakes unleashed by an Ark of Sotek that some will find their way past the foe's defences to deliver a lethal venomous bite.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different enemy units within 9" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Tail Swipe
abilities.description: The mighty Bastiladon swings its clubbed tail into the ranks of enemies, knocking them back with brutal force.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit, to a maximum of 8. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Chief'S Deadly Cargo
abilities.description: Terradons carry heavy boulders hewn from meteoric rock and carved with sigils of destruction. When these are dropped upon enemy lines, those not immediately crushed are sent flying in all directions.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice and add 2 to the roll if this unit is within the combat ranges of any friendly Terradon Riders units. On a 5+: * Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. * If any damage points are allocated by this ability and the target does not have Fly, the target cannot use Run abilities until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Attack From On High
abilities.description: Terradons circle high in the sky, only darting down for a brief moment to launch a strafing run.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Deadly Cargo
abilities.description: Terradons carry heavy boulders hewn from meteoric rock and carved with sigils of destruction. When these are dropped upon enemy lines, those not immediately crushed are sent flying in all directions.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that this unit Pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across this phase to be the target. passed across this phase to be the target. Roll a dice for each model in this
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit, and add 2 to each roll if this unit is unit, and add 2 to each roll if this unit is within the combat ranges of any friendly within the combat ranges of any friendly units. For each 5+: Terradon Chief units. For each 5+: Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. * Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. * If any damage points are allocated by If any damage points are allocated by this ability and the target does not have this ability and the target does not have Fly, the target cannot use Run abilities abilities until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Attack From On High
abilities.description: Terradons circle high in the sky, only darting down for a brief moment to launch a strafing run.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit. shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Blot Toad
abilities.description: When a Ripperdactyl flock takes flight, the Seraphon will seed creatures known as blot toads across the battlefield. These loathsome amphibians emit a pervasive stink that is unpalatable to all cold-blooded creatures, but especially the Ripperdactyls.
abilities.declare: You receive 1 Blot Toad token for each Ripperdactyl Chief or Ripperdactyl Riders unit in your army, to a maximum of 3 tokens. Pick a number of enemy units equal to the number of Blot Toads you have to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Place a Blot Toad next to each target.

abilities.name: Ripperdactyl Assault
abilities.description: A Ripperdactyl Chief is as ferocious as their mount, inspiring nearby Ripperdactyl Riders to attack with unbridled fury.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Moonstone Warspears used by friendly Ripperdactyl Riders units wholly within 12" of this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Toad Rage
abilities.description: The mere scent of a blot toad sends Ripperdactyls into a frenzy.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's Ripperdactyl's Tearing Jaws while it is in combat with any units that have a Blot Toad.

abilities.name: Blot Toad
abilities.description: When a Ripperdactyl flock takes flight, the Seraphon will seed creatures known as blot toads across the battlefield. These loathsome amphibians emit a pervasive stink that is unpalatable to all cold-blooded creatures, but especially the Ripperdactyls.
abilities.declare: You receive 1 Blot Toad token for each Ripperdactyl Chief or Ripperdactyl Riders unit in your army, to a maximum of 3 tokens. Pick a number of enemy units equal to the number of Blot Toads you have to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Place a Blot Toad next to each target.

abilities.name: Toad Rage
abilities.description: The mere scent of a blot toad sends Ripperdactyls into a frenzy.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's Ripperdactyl's Tearing Jaws while it is in combat with any units that have a Blot Toad.

abilities.name: Crushing Stomps
abilities.description: At the command of the Stegadon Chief, the Stegadon crushes its enemies with its unstoppable bulk.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Add 2 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any, if this unit charged this turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Stegadon's Horns and Jaws is 4.

abilities.name: Skink Coordination
abilities.description: A Skink Chief mounted on a Stegadon is in the perfect position to direct the efforts of nearby skink warriors and warbeast handlers, amplifying their destructive power.
abilities.effect: If a friendly non-Monster Skink unit uses the 'Redeploy' command while it is wholly within 18" of this unit, no command points are spent.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Stampede
abilities.description: Stegadons are nigh unstoppable as they crash through the midst of battle.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy Infantry unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, this unit can move 2D6". This unit can pass through models in the target unit but must end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Stegadon's Horns and Jaws is 4.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Stegadon's Horns and Jaws is 4.

abilities.name: Crest Of Horns
abilities.description: A Stegadon prepares to face a charging enemy by turning its mighty head and bracing for impact, impaling the enemy and blunting their attacks with its thickly scaled crest.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+: * Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. * Add 1 to save rolls for attacks made by that enemy unit that target this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Cosmic Engine
abilities.description: The Engine of the Gods is an ancient device capable of disrupting the natural laws of the universe.
abilities.declare: Pick if this unit will harness or reserve the power of its cosmic engine.
abilities.effect: If it will reserve the power, place a cosmic power token next to this unit. If it will harness the power, roll a dice and add the number of cosmic power tokens this unit has to the roll. Then, remove all cosmic power tokens this unit has and pick 1 of the following effects (if possible). Healing Light: On a 3+, you can Heal (D3) all friendly Seraphon units wholly within 12" of this unit. Starlight Summons: On a 5+, you can pick up to 3 friendly Seraphon units wholly within 12" of this unit. Return 1 slain model to each unit. Time Slows: On a 6+, you can pick up to 3 friendly Seraphon units wholly within 12" of this unit. Those units have Strike- first for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Fierce Guardians
abilities.description: The defenders of these ancient edifices will stop at nothing to see any intruders driven back.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Saurus or Kroxigor units that target an enemy unit while that enemy unit is within 9" of this terrain feature.

abilities.name: Power Unleashed
abilities.description: The waves of power that spread from an activated Realmshaper Engine bring the surrounding landscape to violent life.
abilities.declare: If there are any friendly Seraphon Wizards within 3" of this terrain feature, pick another terrain feature within 24" of this terrain feature, then pick up to 3 enemy units within 3" of that terrain feature to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If that terrain feature has a Health characteristic, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.

abilities.name: Revivifying Energies
abilities.description: The cosmic energies emanating from an astrolith protect nearby Seraphon, sealing the most grievous wounds in flashes of cerulean light.
abilities.effect: Friendly Seraphon Infantry units have Ward (6+) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. If a unit already has Ward (6+), it has Ward (5+) instead.

abilities.name: Spawn Of Sotek
abilities.description: Should any of the Serpent God's devoted skink acolytes come to harm, Kroxigor Warspawned are overcome with a terrifying rage.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's melee weapons while this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly Skink Infantry or Skink Cavalry units in combat.

abilities.name: Heav Y-Scaled Skin
abilities.description: The scales of the Warspawned are especially thick and craggy, easily capable of repelling an arrow or musket ball.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of ranged weapons used for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Brutal Blows
abilities.description: Kroxigor swing their weapons in wide arcs, smashing aside a multitude of foes with each blow.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's melee weapons for attacks that target an enemy unit that has 10 or more models.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Carnosaur's Massive Jaws is 2.

abilities.name: Maim And Tear
abilities.description: As champions of the Seraphon hosts, Scar-Veterans and their especially bloodthirsty mounts pursue the greatest enemy warriors, falling on them with vicious brutality.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of damage points the target has. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Terror
abilities.description: This terrifying monstrosity strikes fear into the hearts of its foes.
abilities.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Wrath Of The Seraphon Predatory Exemplar
abilities.description: Oldbloods lead through instinctual ferocity, trusting their saurus kin to follow in their wake.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Saurus Infantry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit's combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.
